tool.name: Minfi map to genome
tool.description: mapping Ilumina methylation array data to the genome

configfiles.configfile:
require("minfi", quietly = TRUE) require(IlluminaHumanMethylation450kanno.ilmn12.hg19, quietly = TRUE)
RSet <- get(load('$input_rset'))
GRSet <- mapToGenome(RSet)
save(GRSet,file = '$output_grset')

param.name: input_rset
param.label: Methylation Data to Map
param.help: This class holds preprocessed data for Illumina methylation microarrays.

tool.help: This tool is mapping Ilumina methylation array data to the genome using 450k annotation package. Depending on the genome, not all methylation loci may have a genomic position. The output is an a GenomicRatioSet object.
